questions.question: To deal with the high-cost, high risk nature of the media business, media makers tend to

choices.answer: Create the timely yet familiar content
Create the novel yet timely content
Create the novel yet familiar content
Create the prominent yet familiar content

questions.question: Genre offering is one of the factors that media creators employ to manage the tension of creating "novel but familiar"
.....is one of the efficient audience tactics by introducing a new show after a successful program or between hits.
In Push & Pull strategies, Pull media are often associated with linear media.
.....is where you might expect to find the richest array of new audience-making possibilities.

choices.answer: Pull audience building in linear media
Push audience building in linear media
Pull audience building in non-linear media
Push audience building in non-linear media
